system.effect: Protects the vessel whilst in the immaterium. If the ship enters the warp unexpectedly, roll 1d10, on a 3 the Gellar Field activates automatically. Protecting the Vessel from warp intrusions.

description.value: Protects the vessel whilst in the immaterium. If the ship enters the warp unexpectedly, roll 1d10, on a 3 the Gellar Field activates automatically. Protecting the Vessel from warp intrusions.
